scripts.build-image: DOCKER_HUB_ACCOUNT=$(grep -oP '(?<="dockerHubAccount": ")[^"]*' package.json) && DOCKER_IMAGE_NAME=$(grep -oP '(?<="dockerImageName": ")[^"]*' package.json) && DOCKER_IMAGE_TAG=$(grep -oP '(?<="version": ")[^"]*' package.json) && docker build -t $DOCKER_HUB_ACCOUNT/$DOCKER_IMAGE_NAME:$DOCKER_IMAGE_TAG .
scripts.release-image: DOCKER_HUB_ACCOUNT=$(grep -oP '(?<="dockerHubAccount": ")[^"]*' package.json) && DOCKER_IMAGE_NAME=$(grep -oP '(?<="dockerImageName": ")[^"]*' package.json) && DOCKER_IMAGE_TAG=$(grep -oP '(?<="version": ")[^"]*' package.json) && docker push $DOCKER_HUB_ACCOUNT/$DOCKER_IMAGE_NAME:$DOCKER_IMAGE_TAG
